text: Israel Vázquez Castañeda (December 25, 1977 – December 2, 2024) was a Mexican professional boxer who competed from 1995 to 2010. He was a three-time super bantamweight world champion. He won the IBF title from 2004 to 2005; and the WBC, The Ring titles twice from 2005 to 2008. He was born in Mexico City, Mexico. Vázquez was diagnosed with stage-4 sarcoma in November 2024. He died from the disease on December 2, 2024 at the age of 46. ==References== ==Other websites== *Israel Vázquez profile at Cyber Boxing Zone Category:1977 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Deaths from sarcoma Category:Mexican boxers Category:Sportspeople from Mexico City
title: Israel Vázquez
